entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiled Xaml Sometimes Ignores Errors in ContentPage.ToolbarItems #20735
  • Border control performance issue #20734
  • SwipeItem inside custom Flyout does not fire command on iOS #20729
    Backlog
  • [XamlC] Compile x:Reference #20726
    Backlog
  • Excessive Increase in Image File Size Upon Saving in iOS platform #20724
  • PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView #20723
    Backlog
  • Child view Measure Invalidated is not getting triggered. #20722
    Backlog
  • netframe 4.8.1 funktionirt nicht . #20720
  • [Windows] When ScrollView moves the scrollbar, the content is incomplete #20719
  • [Test] Write UITest for MenuFlyoutItem Clicked/Command delegate #20718
    Backlog

Closed

  • Error running default Maui/NET8 win10 solution #20721
  • [Bug] Derived control renders with the handler of the base class #1298
    Backlog
  • Text property value does not change at runtime when using a style #19772
    Backlog
  • Cannot launch ios app on simulator or device "does not contain valid CFBundleVersion" #15144

PullRequests

Created

  • Clear logcat and set to a larger size #20732
  • [Trimming] Disable query property assignment via reflection on NativeAOT #20731
  • [ci] Enable 1ES PT #20728
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back #20727
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly call DidFinishNavigation in NavigationDelegate #20725
  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-checkbox

Merged

  • [Core][Hosting] Resolve handler services through registered service types #20298
    area/hosting 🧩

Updated

  • Setup Android App With More Accurate settings #20672
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner
  • Fix page swap from background #19532
    area/navigation 🧭
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Trimming] Use typed bindings internally #20567
    area/Xaml </>
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20708
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [net8.0] Update xharness #20712
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Improvement- alternative geodesic/geolocation distance calculation algorithms #20663
    area/essentials 🍞, area/Maps🗺
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [iOS] Double dash in input field crash fix #20584
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [C] Propagate Resource changes to Background #20637
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • [net9.0] [ci] Remove ForceNet8Current #20716
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.5 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Restructured CodeBehindGenerator pipeline #20524
  • [XC] Compile bindings with Source #20610
    area/Xaml </>
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix Shell.NavBarIsVisible property #20173
    area/Xaml </>, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating back #20420
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, area/gestures
  • RadioButton being Garbage Collected #20472
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
